credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Lost in the Stars: The Music of Kurt Weill
medium:
Offset lithograph on cardboard
Package contains printed white wove paper and a vinyl record with paper labels.
description: Close-up portrait of Kurt Weill printed in sepia tones overlaid with various pictographic symbols printed in blue, pink and orange which refer to computer screen icons. Text printed at top left and center right mimics the curve of Weill's distinctive glasses.
name: Album cover
